main event: A cigar-shaped object, copper in color, was sighted in Lexington, Kentucky on 26 August 1958.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 30 minutes, There were two objects observed, The sighting was noted to possibly be a balloon, but the copper color was inconclusive, The observer was leaving home and specifically called attention to the object, The estimated speed of the object was 6,000 m.p.h.
sighted object: two cigar-shaped objects, copper in color
witness description: Private mail carrier, age 52, previously a naval aviator and lawyer
